languages.text: Лорд-капитан, мы повторно обращаем ваше внимание, что варп-пространство Зева пребывает в большем смятении, чем обычно. Бдение прорицателей посулило нам погибель, а также вещи много худшие. Мы постигаем пустоту не первое десятилетие, и нам доводилось видеть ужасные шторма. Но — не такой. Просим, пощадите нас. Если же на то не будет вашей воли — мы готовы исполнить свой долг до конца.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, мы повторно обращаем ваше внимание, что варп-пространство Зева пребывает в большем смятении, чем обычно. Бдение прорицателей посулило нам погибель, а также вещи много худшие. Мы постигаем пустоту не первое десятилетие, и нам доводилось видеть ужасные шторма. Но — не такой. Просим, пощадите нас. Если же на то не будет вашей воли — мы готовы исполнить свой долг до конца.

languages.text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан, мы повторно обращаем ваше внимание, что варп-пространство Зева пребывает в большем смятении, чем обычно. Если же на то не будет вашей воли — мы готовы исполнить свой долг до конца.

This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

languages.text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, una vez más queremos llamar la atención sobre el hecho de que la región de la disformidad conocida como las Fauces es más turbulenta de lo normal. La vigilia de los adivinos solo nos presagia la muerte y cosas peores. No es nuestra primera década escudriñando el vacío y hemos presenciado tormentas terribles, pero ninguna como esta. Se lo imploramos, tenga compasión. Y, si esa no es su voluntad, sepa que le seguiremos hasta el fin.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

traits.locale_text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, una vez más queremos llamar la atención sobre el hecho de que la región de la disformidad conocida como las Fauces es más turbulenta de lo normal. La vigilia de los adivinos solo nos presagia la muerte y cosas peores. No es nuestra primera década escudriñando el vacío y hemos presenciado tormentas terribles, pero ninguna como esta. Se lo imploramos, tenga compasión. Y, si esa no es su voluntad, sepa que le seguiremos hasta el fin.

languages.text: 舰长大人，我们再次提醒您注意，“巨口”的亚空间湍流比平时更加动荡。占卜者的守望结果预见了我们的死亡，甚至更加糟糕的情况。这并非我们第一次感知虚空。我们也曾见过许多可怕的亚空间风暴，但没有哪次像这次一样恐怖。我们恳求您怜悯我们。不过，如果您执意前进，我们也愿意侍奉您至最后一刻。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人，我们再次提醒您注意，“巨口”的亚空间湍流比平时更加动荡。占卜者的守望结果预见了我们的死亡，甚至更加糟糕的情况。这并非我们第一次感知虚空。我们也曾见过许多可怕的亚空间风暴，但没有哪次像这次一样恐怖。我们恳求您怜悯我们。不过，如果您执意前进，我们也愿意侍奉您至最后一刻。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン、もう一度警告なのですが、マウの歪みの範囲が通常よりも荒れています。占者による警戒が我々に予期させるものは、死やさらに不吉な事態です。ヴォイドを感知したのはこれが初めてではありませんし、ひどい嵐にも遭いました。しかし、これは桁違いです。お願いですので、どうか我々に哀れみを。それがあなたのご意志でないのならば、我々は最後までお仕えする覚悟です。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン、もう一度警告なのですが、マウの歪みの範囲が通常よりも荒れています。占者による警戒が我々に予期させるものは、死やさらに不吉な事態です。ヴォイドを感知したのはこれが初めてではありませんし、ひどい嵐にも遭いました。しかし、これは桁違いです。お願いですので、どうか我々に哀れみを。それがあなたのご意志でないのならば、我々は最後までお仕えする覚悟です。

languages.text: Lord Captain, wir machen Euch noch einmal darauf aufmerksam, dass die Warpregion des Schlunds turbulenter ist als sonst. Die Wachsamkeit der Wahrsager prophezeit uns den Tod, und noch viel Schlimmeres. Dies ist nicht das erste Jahrzehnt, in dem wir die Leere wahrnehmen, und wir haben schon schreckliche Stürme erlebt. Aber keinen wie diesen. Wir flehen Euch an, habt Erbarmen mit uns. Wenn das nicht dein Wille ist, sind wir bereit, bis zum Ende zu dienen.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

languages.text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous attirons de nouveau votre attention sur le fait que le Warp présente des turbulences inhabituelles dans la région de la Gueule. La vigie des devins nous présage un destin bien pire que la mort. Voilà plusieurs décennies que nous percevons le vide, et nous avons été témoins de terribles tempêtes. Mais rien de ce genre. Renoncez, nous vous implorons. Cependant, si votre volonté est de poursuivre, nous vous servirons jusqu'à la fin.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous attirons de nouveau votre attention sur le fait que le Warp présente des turbulences inhabituelles dans la région de la Gueule. La vigie des devins nous présage un destin bien pire que la mort. Voilà plusieurs décennies que nous percevons le vide, et nous avons été témoins de terribles tempêtes. Mais rien de ce genre. Renoncez, nous vous implorons. Cependant, si votre volonté est de poursuivre, nous vous servirons jusqu'à la fin.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, Ağız'ın öteboyut bölgesinin olağan seviyelerden daha türbülanslı olduğu gerçeğine dikkatinizi bir kez daha çekmek isteriz. Kâhinler, ayinlerinde bizim için ölümü, hatta daha beterlerini görüyorlar. Onlarca yıldır uçsuzda seyahat ediyoruz. Çok şiddetli fırtınalar deneyimlemiş olsak da böylesini görmedik. İstirham ediyoruz, lütfen bize merhamet edin. Kararınız bu yönde olmazsa da bilin ki vazifemizi sonuna dek yerine getirmeye hazırız.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, we once again draw your attention to the fact that the warp region of the Maw is more turbulent than usual. The diviners' vigil portends death for us, and much worse besides. This is not our first decade perceiving the void, and we have seen terrible storms. But none like this. We beseech you, please have mercy on us. If that be not your will, we stand ready to serve until the end.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, Ağız'ın öteboyut bölgesinin olağan seviyelerden daha türbülanslı olduğu gerçeğine dikkatinizi bir kez daha çekmek isteriz. Ruhsezerler, ibadetlerinde bizim için ölüm veya çok daha kötü yan etkiler öngörüyorlar. Uçsuzu algıladığımız ilk on yılda değiliz. Çok şiddetli fırtınalar görmüş olsak da böylesini görmemiştik. İstirham ediyoruz, lütfen bize merhamet edin. İradeniz bu yönde olmazsa da elbette sonuna kadar size hizmet etmeye devam edeceğiz.
